code.description: The discount code for the buyers used at the checkout.

amountOff.description: The absolute value of the discount amount. Required when the discount code type is "amount".

percentOff.description: The percentage rate of the discount. Required when the discount code type is "percent".

amountMinimum.description: Required minimum order amount for the discount code to be applicable.

numAvailable.description: Number of discount codes that can be used.

expiresAt.description: Expiry date of the discount code. yyyy-MM-ddZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21+0300).
